definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Saccharin, the oldest artificial sweetener, was first produced in 1879.
sentences.chinese: 糖精，最古老的甜味劑，於1879年初次生產。

sentences.english: And you can cut down fat and sugar more by using skim milk and an artificial sweetener.
sentences.chinese: 並且可以使用脫脂奶和人工甜味劑減少脂肪和糖。

sentences.english: Free from preservatives, alcohol, artificial flavouring, sweeteners, and colourings.
sentences.chinese: 不含防腐劑，酒精，野生香料，甜味劑和色素。

sentences.english: But the Senate added so-called sweeteners for the House.
sentences.chinese: 但參議院爲衆議院增加了所謂的甜味劑。

sentences.english: What's sweetening your post-workout drink or snack?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是您運動後飲料或點心的甜味劑？

sentences.english: Artificial sweeteners stimulate the same cells in our tongues as sugar does.
sentences.chinese: 人造甜味劑和糖一樣刺激我們舌頭上的相同細胞。

sentences.english: Besides, the stability of sucralose and other sweetener in the wine were compared in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 同時比較了三氯蔗糖與其他甜味劑在酒中的穩定性。

sentences.english: Despite the debate, plenty of people continue to down artificial sweeteners.
sentences.chinese: 儘管有爭論存在，許多人繼續食用人造甜味劑。

sentences.english: But are sugar substitutes safe to use?
sentences.chinese: 但是這是這些甜味劑安全嗎？

sentences.english: If stevia sweeteners are to become truly popular, they must overcome two obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 如果甜葉菊甜味劑要走的更遠，它必須克服兩個障礙。

sentences.english: You can use honey, molasses, and minced dried fruits for sweetening .
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用蜂蜜，糖漿，和肉末乾果的甜味劑。

sentences.english: Xylitol is a five-carbon sugar alcohol that is used as a sugar substitute.
sentences.chinese: 木糖醇是一種用作甜味劑的五碳多元醇。

sentences.english: But go easy on the sweeteners; too much sugar before bed can have an anti-calming effect.
sentences.chinese: 但是少加些甜味劑，過量的糖會有反鎮定的效果。

sentences.english: No artificial colorings, flavorings or sweeteners.
sentences.chinese: 無人工色素，香料或甜味劑。

sentences.english: It is the only sweetener to show both passive and active anti-caries effects.
sentences.chinese: 它是唯一的甜味劑，顯示被動和主動的防齲效果。

sentences.english: Citric acid and lacto-calcium can reduce the pungency of acetic acid beverage, rock candy as the sweeter…
sentences.chinese: 冰糖作爲醋酸飲料的甜味劑能提供清爽的口感。
